subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Toronto point guard scored 22 points — including the final field goal, over Kevin Garnett — in a victory over the Nets that evened the teams’ playoff series at two games each.
snippet: The Toronto point guard scored 22 points — including the final field goal, over Kevin Garnett — in a victory over the Nets that evened the teams’ playoff series at two games each.
